QuestData.Title: Thundering Plains
QuestData.Description:
There is a great storm beast which wanders this ridge. Many a Shikaar hunter has attempted to take it down, only to fall to its ferocity.
If you wish for some hunting glory, you may attempt to bring down the beast. Bring back its horn as tribute.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A nasty thunder lizard with a penchant for destroying centaur camps.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work. Yours will be a tale to be told to our next generation of hunters.
